nodes.content: Oh god oh fuck why did I do that???
It was like my fingers moved on their own?
[shake][wave]YOU HAVE TERMINATED MY VASSAL! WITH THIS MOMENT MY PACT IS FULFILLED AND THE MORTAL'S FLESH BECOMES MY OWN![/wave][/shake]
[i]Please human, I promise I am a friend. Come to the forest. We need your help, and you need ours[/i]s
